comment.author: 51979177@N02
comment._content: A very similar pic to this (same location...maybe on a previous run) appeared in a harvest feature article which was published in the Sydney Mail 30/1/1907 (p. 285)...where it was titled 'Modern Harvesting in a Typical Western Wheatfield' (this is the closest link I can find to the page!) - news.google.com/newspapers?id=bGpVAAAAIBAJ&sjid=eJUDA... ; per the Sydney Mail this pic was evidently taken at Ross brothers' farm, 'Combella', near Wellington...some of the other pics in the Sydney Mail article were also taken at 'Combella', with others evidently taken near Orange and at Narromine...I've also discovered that the Sydney Mail tended to pad out their feature articles with photos from their photo archive...so pending further info emerging, I wouldn't be too emphatic re the location/date of all the pics in the Sydney Mail article. Also see these other pics from the PHM Tyrrell Collection which appeared in this Sydney Mail article - www.flickr.com/photos/powerhouse_museum/2363537902/ www.flickr.com/photos/powerhouse_museum/2451472036/ Also see this pic from the PHM Tyrrell Collection which didn't make the Sydney Mail article, but which appears to involve the same teams/location. www.flickr.com/photos/powerhouse_museum/2363514272/#/
